name: unhealthy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 not good for your health: an unhealthy diet The consequences of an unhealthy lifestyle include a higher risk of diabetes, heart diseases, stroke, and cancer. Synonyms
insalubrious formal
sickly (ILL)
unsanitaryOpposites
healthful US
healthy (HEALTH)
salubrious formal
sanitary
(of a person, animal, or part of the body) not strong or well: I had smoked for over 20 years and was very unhealthy.
not good for someone or not acceptable because it does not seem normal: Parents should be aware if young people develop an unhealthy interest in death and begin to appear depressed. There are healthy and unhealthy ways to express angry feelings.
More examplesFewer examplesWe worked very hard under unhealthy and harsh conditions and without any support from outside.Too many people are forced to eat cheap, unhealthy food.They had eating habits that should have made them obese or unhealthy but somehow did not.Your gums are fine, your tongue's fine, but your tonsils look very unhealthy.Police said the man had an unhealthy obsession with weapons such as knives and bayonets.They aren't on the same wavelength and this disconnect is unhealthy for their relationship.
